howItWorks.subtitle: USAGE GUIDE
howItWorks.title: How does
howItWorks.desc: Discover how easy it is to manage your collective savings in few steps.
howItWorks.s1d: Sign up in seconds with your email. Your information is protected with the highest security standards.
howItWorks.s2d: Define your group name, the quota amount and the payment frequency. Everything is fully customizable.
howItWorks.s3d: Invite your friends, family or colleagues. Manage their turns and validate their participation easily.
howItWorks.s4d: Keep a detailed record of who has paid and who is due to receive the savings in each cycle.
howItWorks.s5d: Assign and supervise the 'manos' or payout turns transparently for all members.

faqPage.subtitle: COMMON DOUBTS
faqPage.title: Frequently Asked
faqPage.desc: Everything you need to know about our savings platform.
faqPage.q1: How much does the platform charge for its use?
faqPage.a1: Absolutely nothing. Digital Cuchubal is free for all users. We do not charge commissions nor do we directly handle your money.
faqPage.q2: Do deposits have to be made on the platform?
faqPage.a2: No. The platform works as an administrative manager. Payments and deposits are made directly between participants by the means they agree upon (cash, transfer, etc.).
faqPage.q3: Are there usage or group limits?
faqPage.a3: We do not have predefined limits. You can create as many groups (cuchubales) and add as many participants as you need.
faqPage.a4: We believe in the power of community savings. Our goal is to digitalize a cultural tradition and make it safer and more organized for everyone.
faqPage.q5: How is the security of my data guaranteed?
faqPage.a5: We use advanced security protocols and encryption to protect your personal information. Your data is never shared with third parties.

privacyPage.subtitle: LEGAL
privacyPage.title: Privacy and
privacyPage.desc: Your security is the fundamental pillar of our platform.
privacyPage.s1d: At Cuchubal, the confidentiality of your personal information is our priority. We recognize that the trust placed in us is based on respect for privacy. We are firmly committed to protecting the personal data we collect.
privacyPage.s2d: Passwords and sensitive data are stored using irreversible hash algorithms. It is technically impossible for us or third parties to read your original credentials.
privacyPage.s3d: We collect essential information for the operation of the service: name, email and access credentials. This data is used exclusively for the management of your savings groups and the interactivity of the portal.
privacyPage.s4d: We offer the option to definitively delete groups and accounts. By doing so, all related information is permanently deleted from our servers. We do not keep a history of data suppressed by users.
